value.title: Nothing selected in Power BI Slicer? Then don't show data!

value.title: Power BI Bookmarks, Selections and Toggles
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can use bookmarks and selections to create interesting reports to show different aspects of your data. He also shows a very cool way to change between those selections that he picked up from one of his customers.  Bookmarks - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-desktop-bookmarks/

value.title: Power BI REST API no-code options
value.excerpt: Adam shows how you can use the Power BI REST API without writing any code. Then takes it to the next level with PowerShell. value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to load data from a flat file to the data model. This could be a text, csv or excel file with a lot of columns. Don't just pull it into Power BI. Take time to structure your data in your data model. From flat file to data model is basic concept, but is

value.title: Row-Level Security and Object-Level Security together in Power BI??? Yup!

value.title: Power BI real time streaming dataset
value.excerpt: Datasets in Power BI can have connection types such as Import, DirectQuery or Live Connection. However, there is also one specific type of dataset which is different. This type of dataset is called Streaming Dataset. A streaming dataset is for a real-time dashboard and comes with various setups and configurations.
